name: ManOVache
description:
ManOVache is a 2D Infinite runner

Man has a thirst for milk - Press the spacebar to jump and collect milk

When your milk gets to 0 you will switch to Vache (Cow) - Jump and eat the grass to produce more milk to turn back into Man.

This is a PC Version of the game - still in development

The Android version is complete and available on the app store.
